version.description: the current version of the repository

npmClient.description: an option to specify a specific client to run commands with

ignoreChanges.description: an array of globs that won't be included in lerna `changed/publish`

message.description: a custom commit message when performing version updates for publication

ignore.description: an array of globs that won't be bootstrapped when running the `lerna bootstrap` command

npmClientArgs.description: array of strings that will be passed as arguments directly to `npm install` during the `lerna bootstrap` command

scope.description: an array of globs that restricts which packages will be bootstrapped when running the `lerna bootstrap` command

packages.description: Array of globs to use as package locations
